name: Monkey Business (itch) (enderr42)
description:
#LD48

NB: Run Web build in fullscreen mode (bottom-left corner buttn)

There are rumors of a rare golden banana hidden in a temple deep in the jungle. Build up your industry, clear the jungle, export BANANAS all to pave the repulsing green and brown in a pleasant shade of concrete grey like my skin right now and find the ultimate prize!
